title: Strengthening Business Strategy Practical Competencies: Simulation-Enhanced Education (SEE) for Neurosurgery Training

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Participants will accurately replicate over 80% of complex neurosurgical procedures through simulation training.
Participants will achieve top 25% technical proficiency compared to peers using simulation assessment tools.
After training, participants will propose at least three decision-making strategies applicable to real clinical scenarios.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
